body:
yeah, this is going to be serious

we will be playing for another tournament the day we play the Invitationals on the Avicus tournament, so can WE GIVE our spot? Also CAN WE CHOOSE who are we giving it to?

If we can't choose, then DON'T DO anything with our spot

thx
